channel.title: Posts on My website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My website

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: Last Week of School Blog Post I did it, I managed to complete a really weird semester, and an even weirder year! Learning R and Python was one of my favorite parts of my year. Courses that will stick with me beyond the semester are so valuable, and I'm excited to continue my coding journey next year. One of the recent things we learned was how to code Python within R markdown and how to share information between R and Python.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
